units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Veil
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Doc
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Bulwark
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets â€” medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

opponent.placementPrompt: Spread units across the front with ranged support behind. Keep the medic protected.
